text:
I've managed to get the email pull through now to my function, so, upon clicking a button it 'should' enrol the contact into a workflow using the following endpoint:
POST /automation/v2/workflows/:workflowId/enrollments/contacts/:email

However i'm getting the following error and struggling to track down the cause of it...
Error triggering workflow: {
  status: 'error',
  message: 'resource not found'
}
Just to update in-case anyone else is struggling with this endpoint... the ID in the workflow URL is not the right ID to use... i got it via GET and it is now working perfectly :)

Heyyy. Anyone knows if the serverless functions from the UI-Extensions Beta (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview>) have the same execution limits as documented here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions>?
